synopsis.text: So, meet Kirishima Tooru, the infamous "Demon of Sakuragi," a high-ranking member of the Sakuragi crime family with a penchant for violence. When his reputation starts to become a liability, his boss assigns him an unexpected task: to care for his precious seven-year-old daughter, Yaeka. As Tooru navigates the unfamiliar territory of parenthood and Yaeka learns to express her emotions, the unlikely duo forms a unique bond. Follow their heartwarming journey as they discover that family isn't always about blood relations, and sometimes, even the toughest guys have a soft spot. Get ready for a heartwarming comedy that explores the unexpected side of a yakuza's life!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
